mapper.select: SELECT dateDay, intInstagram, intYoutube, intBlog, intWork FROM TB_WORKS WHERE dateDay BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY dateDay ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WORKS (dateDay, intInstagram, intYoutube, intBlog, intWork) VALUES (#{dateDay}, #{intInstagram}, #{intYoutube}, #{intBlog}, #{intWork});
INSERT INTO TB_USERS (dateDay, intInfluencer, intClient) VALUES (#{dateDay}, #{intInfluencer}, #{intClient});

mapper.update: create table TB_WORK_${intSeq}_LOG ( intSeq int auto_increment, dateDay date null, intMediaSeq int null, intMediaType tinyint null, intClientSeq int null, intInfluencerSeq int null, intCount1 int default 0 null, intCount2 int default 0 null, intCount3 int default 0 null, intCount4 int default 0 null, intCount5 int default 0 null, intCount6 int default 0 null, intCount7 int default 0 null, intCount8 int default 0 null, intCount9 int default 0 null, intCount10 int default 0 null, constraint TB_WORK_${intSeq}_LOG_pk primary key (intSeq) );
